section.section: The Trust, in consultation with the Corps Board, shall make grants to qualified organizations for the creation or expansion of full- and part-time Chesapeake Conservation Corps Programs, that involve citizens of all ages throughout the State, to carry out this part.
Corps programs shall engage and develop volunteers and stipend volunteers in environmental and energy conservation projects.
Eligible Corps Program expenses include personnel costs, stipends, supplies, and other materials for projects undertaken by Corps Program volunteers.

text.section: The Trust, in consultation with the Corps Board, shall develop guidelines for evaluating applications from qualified organizations.

A grant agreement regarding funds from the Trust shall:
Specify the allowed use of the funds provided under the grant, including accountability measures and performance requirements;
Take into account the need for efficient multiyear funding and administration of the funds; and
Include provisions for verification that Corps programs and projects are being implemented as planned.
